cn.domob.android.ads

接口 InterstitialAdListener

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FeedsAdView

    public interface InterstitialAdListener

    An interface for listening Domob interstitial ads.

    Realizes callback of interstitial ad's various state with this listener interface.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onInterstitialAdClicked(InterstitialAd interstitialAd)
      Indicate that ad has been clicked according to domob's rule(some misbehaviors will be filtered)
      void onInterstitialAdDismiss()
      Invoked when interstitial ad is dismissed
      void onInterstitialAdFailed(AdManager.ErrorCode code)
      Invoked when interstitial ad is failed to acquire
      void onInterstitialAdLeaveApplication()
      Invoked when ad is causing to leave application
      void onInterstitialAdPresent()
      Invoked when interstitial ad is to present
      void onInterstitialAdReady()
      Invoked when interstitial ad is ready
      void onLandingPageClose()
      Invoked when LandingPage is closed
      void onLandingPageOpen()
      Invoked when LandingPage is opened

        从以下版本开始:
